text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Bank" means a commercial bank, a national banking association, an other-state bank, or a federally chartered savings bank or savings and loan association.
"Constituent bank" means a party to a consolidation, merger, or transfer of assets.
"Successor" means the bank that carries on the business of the constituent banks after a consolidation, merger, or transfer of assets.
"Transfer assets", "transfer its assets", or "transfer of assets" means to sell, lease, exchange, or otherwise transfer all or substantially all of the property and assets of a constituent bank.
